Posts.Title: Shopping list for chemo - am I missing anything?

Posts.Content: Hugs honey. I lost mine after day 19 from my first FEC even after the cold cap. I was having major panic attacks and wrote it on here. I was bald on top and like a monk and knew I had to shave it for my own sanity but the hardest thing I've ever done. I had it shaved by the wig lady last Thursday and I was instantly relieved. I still haven't let anyone see my bald head even my hubby but I felt more in control after getting rid of it. Finding hair everywhere and all over clothes the floor etc  was really hard and don't have that now. I was losing the lot anyway. I had a free wig on the NHS too just ask at the hospital. It really look real but hard to get used to but O hope that changes with time. I still think people are staring. I got a great wee cap that is soft jersey and a nice style from suburban turban called a Kimmy. Fab and great service. Good luck and let us know how you get on!!! Morag xx
